original_title: Give Me Back My Own Picture Perfect Memory!
overview: While my father created a picture archive of my childhood, my grandmother destroyed the family photo albums just before her death. Stuck between these extremes, I venture out to question old pictures, produce new ones and find a perspective. My journey takes me to East Berlin, Poland and through Hamburg. This documentary deals with the shape of memory, the ease of forgetting and last not least, making films.
title: Give Me Back My Own Picture Perfect Memory!
